name: Dragon Cannon
notes: While transitioning to DSS from other moves, it is possible to input DSS.f+3 as a Just Frame (ex; 4,3~F:DSS.f+3) for 4 more damage.

name: Dragon's Flight
notes: While transitioning to DSS from other moves, it is possible to input DSS.f+4 as a Just Frame (ex; 4,3~F:DSS.f+4) for 4 more damage.

name: Turning Knuckles
